documentation.text:
@notice Will be "nToken {Underlying Token}.name()", therefore "USD Coin" will be
 nToken USD Coin
@notice Will be "n{Underlying Token}.symbol()", therefore "USDC" will be "nUSDC"
@notice Currency id that this nToken refers to
@notice Total number of tokens in circulation
@notice Returns the present value of the nToken's assets denominated in asset tokens
@notice Returns the present value of the nToken's assets denominated in underlying

allowance(address,address).notice: Get the number of tokens `spender` is approved to spend on behalf of `account`

params.account: The address of the account holding the funds
params.spender: The address of the account spending the funds

approve(address,uint256).details: This will overwrite the approval amount for `spender`  and is subject to issues noted [here](https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-20#approve)  emit:Approval
approve(address,uint256).notice: Approve `spender` to transfer up to `amount` from `src`

params.amount: The number of tokens that are approved (2^256-1 means infinite)
params.spender: The address of the account which may transfer tokens

returns._0: Whether or not the approval succeeded

balanceOf(address).notice: Get the number of tokens held by the `account`

params.account: The address of the account to get the balance of

currencyId().notice: Currency id that this nToken refers to

getPresentValueAssetDenominated().notice: Returns the present value of the nToken's assets denominated in asset tokens

getPresentValueUnderlyingDenominated().notice: Returns the present value of the nToken's assets denominated in underlying

name().notice: Will be "nToken {Underlying Token}.name()", therefore "USD Coin" will be nToken USD Coin

symbol().notice: Will be "n{Underlying Token}.symbol()", therefore "USDC" will be "nUSDC"

totalSupply().notice: Total number of tokens in circulation

params.amount: The number of tokens to transfer
params.to: The address of the destination account

returns._0: Whether or not the transfer succeeded

params.amount: The number of tokens to transfer
params.from: The address of the source account
params.to: The address of the destination account

returns._0: Whether or not the transfer succeeded

natspec.notice: ERC20 proxy for nToken contracts that forwards calls to the Router, all nToken balances and allowances are stored in at single address for gas efficiency. This contract is used simply for ERC20 compliance.
